content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to current information on Spector's business model and operations; thus, I cannot provide specific details on their success. However, regardless of the challenges, insurance companies must adapt and evolve to stay competitive, retain customers, and maintain profitability.

Insurance companies that successfully navigate the changing market tend to have a few things in common. They tend to:

1. Be innovative: These companies continuously look for new products, services, and technologies to serve their customers better and stay ahead of the competition.

2. Focus on customer experience: These companies prioritize the customer experience and work to create products and services that meet customer needs more effectively.

3. Adopt advanced technology: These companies leverage advanced technologies like AI, machine learning, and automation to streamline their operations and improve efficiency.

4. Stay agile: Insurance companies that can pivot and adapt to new market changes while remaining agile tend to be more successful.

5. Invest in their employees: These companies invest in their employees' development and provide the resources and training required to keep staff up to date with the latest technological advancements and industry best practices.
